import "./App.css"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import BooksGrid from "./BooksGrid"; import SearchPage from "./SearchPage"; import * as BooksAPI from './BooksAPI'; function App() { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); useEffect(()=>{ const getBooks = async ()=>{ const res = await BooksAPI.getAll(); setBooks([...res.map(b=>{return {title:b['title'],id:b['id'],authors:b['authors'],shelf:b['shelf'],previewLink:b['previewLink']}}) ]); console.log("from outside books : " +JSON.stringify(books)) } getBooks(); } ,[]) let booksList=[ { id:1, title: "Ender's Game", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], previewLink:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", shelf:"Read" }, { id:2, title: "to Kill a Mockingbird", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], previewLink:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", shelf:"Read" } , { id:3, title: "Amr", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], previewLink:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", shelf:"Read" }, { id:4, title: "EE", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], previewLink:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", shelf:"Want to Read" }, { id:5, title: "tt", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], previewLink:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", shelf:"Want to Read" } , { id:6, title: "AA", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], previewLink:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", shelf:"Want to Read" }, { id:7, title: "CC", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], previewLink:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", shelf:"Currently Reading" }, { id:8, title: "FF", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], previewLink:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", shelf:"Currently Reading" } , { id:9, title: "GG", authors:["Orson Scott Card"], previewLink:"http://books.google.com/books/content?id=yDtCuFHXbAYC&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&imgtk=AFLRE72RRiTR6U5OUg3IY_LpHTL2NztVWAuZYNFE8dUuC0VlYabeyegLzpAnDPeWxE6RHi0C2ehrR9Gv20LH2dtjpbcUcs8YnH5VCCAH0Y2ICaKOTvrZTCObQbsfp4UbDqQyGISCZfGN&source=gbs_api", shelf:"Currently Reading" } ] const [books,setBooks]=useState([...booksList]) const updateBookState = (book)=>{ alert("App.js >> book updated >> "+JSON.stringify(book)); booksList = books.map(b=>{ return b.id===book.id?book:b} ) console.log("App.js >> booksList >> "+JSON.stringify([...booksList])); setBooks([...booksList]); BooksAPI.update(book,book.shelf) alert("App.js >> books >> "+JSON.stringify(books)); console.log("App.js >> books >> "+JSON.stringify(books)); } const updateBooksinApp = (book)=>{ updateBookState(book) } return (
{showSearchPage ? ( //
//
// setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} // > // Close // //
// //
//
//
//
    //
    //
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Currently Reading

    b.shelf==='currentlyReading')} updateBooksinApp={updateBooksinApp} /> {/*
    1. To Kill a Mockingbird
      Harper Lee
    2. Ender's Game
      Orson Scott Card
    */}

    Want to Read

    b.shelf==='wantToRead')} updateBooksinApp={updateBooksinApp}/> {/*
    1. 1776
      David McCullough
    2. Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
      J.K. Rowling
    */}

    Read

    b.shelf==='read')} updateBooksinApp={updateBooksinApp} /> {/*
    1. The Hobbit
      J.R.R. Tolkien
    2. Oh, the Places You'll Go!
      Seuss
    3. The Adventures of Tom Sawyer
      Mark Twain
    */}
    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
